column3: Traffic;Kampong Chhnang: A train running in the direction of Phnom Penh came off the tracks in Tbengkoul distric
column7: 2018.------ ------A passenger traveling by train from Battambang to Phnom Penh said the train they were riding had come off the rails in  remote place. He then removed his motorcycle from the carriage and drove himself to Phnom Penh.------The authorities have not yet disclosed the exact details of the  accidents and the amount of property damage
